name: Tracing Memory
description:
Tracing Memory is a 2D puzzle platformer game about helping  Evra find her memory and help her buddy, Sara fulfill his destiny.

In the process of journey and adventure, you will need to control and combine the platforms from other spaces to solve puzzles and help Evra get closer to her goal. Meanwhile, you will be constantly trained in jumping skills to get through the difficulties.

Playtime: ~45 mins. 

Available: MAC & Windows 

Need: Mouse and Keyboard
